segments.text: I don't know how John can put up with his son , who fools around without working .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's out of John's hands . Nothing he can do about such a black sheep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I were him , I would give him a good talking-to . I would insist on his stopping fooling around like that .
segments.speaker: S1
